name: Disco Tower -- Capstone Project
description:
"Disco Tower" game is a "Capstone Project" submitted for course  Game Design and Development 5, developed from scratch. 

This course is a part of  Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 Specialization on Coursera by MSU.

Submitted by: Suraj Kamya

Mail ID: kamyasuraj@yahoo.com

By: Suraj Kamya, kamyasuraj@yahoo.com

All assets used in game are from free sources only.
